parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
- No image reference constraints provided.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration
- Genre / subject focus: Urban / Street

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed
- Line weight: Thin Clean Lines
- Line quality: Clean / Polished

Color & Lighting:
- Lighting style: Studio Lighting
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium

Rendering Technique:
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Mood keywords: Whimsical

TASK
- Generate a single composite image containing three views of the same character.
- All three views must depict the exact same woman with identical facial structure, skin tone, and hair.
- This image will be used as a canonical character reference for future illustrations.
- Focus on naturalism, restraint, and identity clarity rather than drama or action.
- The character must appear adult and non-sexualized.

SUBJECT
- Name: Eve
- Gender: Woman
- Apparent age: Late 20s
- Species: Human
- Ethnicity / features: Northern European facial structure with a deep sun-kissed tan
- Overall impression: Natural, grounded, quietly confident, pre-civilization human

PHYSIOGNOMY
- Face shape: Balanced oval with subtle cheekbone definition
- Jawline: Soft but defined
- Nose: Straight, natural proportions
- Lips: Medium fullness, relaxed
- Eyes: Almond-shaped, calm gaze
- Eyebrows: Natural thickness, minimal shaping
- Expression: Neutral, serene, thoughtful
- Skin: Deep natural tan, sun-exposed, healthy texture (not glossy or stylized)

HAIR
- Hair color: Dark blonde to light brown
- Texture: Naturally wavy
- Length: Long, falling past the shoulders
- Styling: Loose, unstyled, wind-set
- Part: Natural, slightly off-center

BODY & PRESENTATION
- Body type: Natural, athletic-slim
- Posture: Relaxed, upright, unposed
- Ornamentation: None
- Makeup: None
- Clothing: Minimal mythological covering (subtle foliage or neutral wrap), not decorative

TURNAROUND PANEL REQUIREMENTS
- Layout: Three evenly spaced views in a single image
- Views (left to right):
  1. Portrait view (straight-on)
  2. Three-quarter view (slight turn, primary identity reference)
  3. Profile view (full side silhouette)
- Scale: All views at the same scale
- Lighting: Neutral, even lighting for clarity
- Background: Simple, unobtrusive neutral background

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.
